tweaklite.config.title: TweakLite Config
tweaklite.config.hotkey.openConfigGui.To: Key to open this configuration screen.
tweaklite.config.hotkey.apply_player_sca: Key to apply custom scale to yourself.
tweaklite.config.hotkey.apply_entity_sca: Key to apply custom scale to the targeted entity.
tweaklite.config.render.noPumpkinBlur.To: Toggles the blur overlay when wearing a carved pumpkin.
tweaklite.config.general.player_attack_r: Sets the player's attack reach distance.
tweaklite.config.general.player_block_ra: Sets the player's block interaction reach distance.
tweaklite.config.general.player_scale_si: Sets the player's scale size multiplier.
tweaklite.config.general.entity_scale_si: Sets the scale size multiplier for targeted entities.
tweaklite.config.render.sheared_goat_hor: Allows shearing goat horns with shears.
tweaklite.config.creative.copy_spawn_egg: Middle-click entities while holding Ctrl to copy their NBT to spawn eggs
